adminScreen.title: Replies
adminScreen.confirmDeleteReplyText: Are you sure that you wish to delete the reply?

errorDialog.title: Whoops! Something went wrong
errorDialog.unsavedContents: Please note that unsaved content will not be saved when reloading. If you have unsaved content on this page, you can close this message and copy the content to the clipboard before reloading.
errorDialog.reportIssue: If the problem persists, contact support@metatavu.fi by email. Please include technical details in to the email to speed up resolution of the problem.
